message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair and reasonable start!
I'll take a larger share this time, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a better deal to account for the inflation!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll try to find a middle ground.
You're running out of time, and so am I...
This is my last stand! I'll give you the majority, but I won't be taken advantage of!
